lead_paragraph: Swiss authorities have opened criminal proceedings against German football great Franz Beckenbauer and two former presidents of Germany's football federation (DFB) in connection with its successful bid for the 2006 World Cup.

headline.print_headline: Swiss Launch Criminal Probe of Beckenbauer Over German World Cup Bid
headline.main: Swiss Launch Criminal Probe of Beckenbauer Over German World Cup Bid
